discourse_list.title: SEC Chair makes appearance at Penn Law Capital Markets Association and talks stablecoins

content.content: SEC Chair Gary Gensler spoke at the Penn Law Capital Markets Association at the University of Pennsylvania on Monday. Of note, he addressed stablecoins.  Below I have included an article about the event, as well as Gensler’s remarks. It seems stablecoins are on the SEC’s radar.    CoinGeek – 5 Apr 22    SEC Chair Gary Gensler: ‘No reason’ to treat digital asset market differently... The thrust of SEC Chair Gary Gensler’s address may be already self-evident to many: that current laws already apply to digital assets regardless of how novel the technology may be.  Est. reading time: 5 minutes          sec.gov   SEC.gov | Prepared Remarks of Gary Gensler On Crypto Markets Penn Law Capital... Prepared Remarks of Gary Gensler On Crypto Markets Penn Law Capital Markets Association Annual Conference by Chair Gary Gensler April 4, 2022

They can no longer turn a blind eye to this revolution. Most likely, they will be threatened by the development of their digital dollar. Likewise, most bank-issue style stablecoins (usdt, usdc) are at their mercy.
I was surprised by the emphasis (and presumed narrative) on stablecoins. More of a reason to be proactive instead of reactive.
